description: NATT Ghost Agent — Baseline and Additional Skills Capabilities Catalog
source: DevBot src/agents/natt-skills.ts + natt-skills-cloud.ts + natt-skills-cve.ts + natt-skills-osint.ts + natt-skills-nuclei.ts + natt-skills-llm.ts + natt-skills-mobile.ts + natt-skills-rag.ts + natt.ts + natt-roe.ts + natt-vault.ts + natt-memory.ts + natt-report.ts + natt-report-cron.ts

passive.description: Read-only recon. Zero writes, no auth probes.

stealth.description: Low-impact probes. Rate-limited, single-try vectors, randomized delays.

active.description: Full test suite. Multi-payload sends, auth bypass probes, fuzzing.

baseline.description: Skills available in all NATT installations out of the box.

skills.name: Hash Identification
skills.description: Identifies hash type from format: MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, NTLM, LM, bcrypt, argon2, scrypt, PBKDF2, WordPress, Drupal, Unix crypt.

skills.name: Password Policy Assessment
skills.description: Evaluates password policy strength from observable signals: min length, complexity, history, rotation, MFA.

skills.name: Default Credential Lookup
skills.description: Looks up known default credentials for 40+ services: routers, CMS platforms, databases, IoT devices.

skills.name: Credential Stuffing Surface Analysis
skills.description: Identifies credential exposure vectors: credentials in URL, Basic Auth, HTTP transport, HSTS absence, autocomplete.

skills.name: 80+ Secret Pattern Scan
skills.description: Scans any text content against compiled regex patterns for API keys, tokens, certificates, and credentials. Optional filename param provides context for reporting.

skills.name: Shannon Entropy Analysis
skills.description: Calculates information entropy of a string in bits per character.

skills.name: Likely Secret Detection
skills.description: Determines if a string value is likely a secret based on Shannon entropy > 4.0 bits/char and length > 16. Catches secrets that don't match known regex patterns.

skills.name: Secrets → NATT Findings Converter
skills.description: Converts raw secret scan results into structured NATTFinding objects with OWASP categorization, CVSS scoring, and remediation steps.

skills.name: JWT Structure Audit
skills.description: Decodes JWT (no verification), audits algorithm, claims, expiry, issuer, and identifies known weakness vectors.
detectedIssues: algorithm: HS256 with likely public key (RS256 confusion surface)

skills.name: Auth Bypass Vector Catalog
skills.description: Returns relevant auth bypass vectors filtered by context. Each vector includes test steps, payloads, and remediation.

additional.description: Extended capabilities beyond baseline — applied domain skills, future expansion slots, and third-party integrations.

skills.name: Technology Fingerprinting
skills.description: Identifies frontend framework, backend, CDN, WAF from headers + HTML meta patterns.

skills.name: Sitemap & robots.txt Enumeration
skills.description: Fetches /sitemap.xml, /sitemap_index.xml, /robots.txt — builds full URL tree and identifies disallowed paths.

skills.name: Error Page Fingerprinting
skills.description: Probes with malformed requests to extract version numbers, stack traces, config paths from error responses.

skills.name: Cookie Surface Map
skills.description: Documents all Set-Cookie headers, flags missing HttpOnly/Secure/SameSite attributes.

skills.name: OG Tag & Social Metadata Harvest
skills.description: Extracts og:*, twitter:card, schema.org markup for brand and content recon.

skills.name: CSP Policy Audit
skills.description: Parses Content-Security-Policy header/meta, flags unsafe-inline, unsafe-eval, wildcard origins, missing directives.

skills.name: DOM XSS Sink Map
skills.description: Identifies innerHTML, document.write, eval(), setTimeout(string), location.assign(string) sinks in inline scripts.

skills.name: Form Intelligence Gathering
skills.description: Extracts all form elements, action/method, hidden inputs, CSRF token presence, autocomplete posture.

skills.name: Subresource Integrity Audit
skills.description: Checks all third-party scripts/stylesheets for integrity= attribute presence and hash correctness.

skills.name: iFrame Sandbox Audit
skills.description: Flags unscoped iframe embeds, missing sandbox attribute, allow-scripts without isolation.

skills.name: CORS Misconfiguration Test
skills.description: Sends crafted Origin headers, checks ACAO:* combined with Allow-Credentials:true.

skills.name: GraphQL Introspection Probe
skills.description: Sends __schema query to map full schema if introspection is enabled.

skills.name: Mass Assignment Probe
skills.description: Sends extra fields in POST/PUT bodies (role, admin, isActive) — checks if silently accepted.

skills.name: HTTP Method Override Recon
skills.description: Tests X-HTTP-Method-Override, X-Method-Override, _method param for PUT/DELETE escalation.

skills.name: Shadow & Legacy API Discovery
skills.description: Probes /v0, /v2, /internal, /admin, /debug, /swagger, /openapi.json for undocumented surfaces.

skills.name: SSL/TLS Posture Audit
skills.description: Protocol version support, cipher suite weakness, cert expiry, chain validation flags.

skills.name: HTTP Security Headers Audit
skills.description: HSTS, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, Referrer-Policy, Permissions-Policy completeness check.

skills.name: CDN/WAF Detection
skills.description: Identifies Cloudflare, AWS CloudFront, Fastly, Akamai from headers and IP range patterns.

skills.name: Banner Grab Interpretation
skills.description: Parses service banners to extract version numbers, flags EOL software, suggests CVE correlation.

skills.name: File Upload Security Audit
skills.description: MIME type bypass, double extension, null byte injection, path traversal in filenames.

skills.name: SVG XSS Vector Analysis
skills.description: Analyzes SVG content for embedded script, foreignObject, xlink:href XSS vectors.

skills.name: Media CDN Configuration Audit
skills.description: Hotlinking exposure, signed URL enforcement, CORS on media origin, segment URL predictability for HLS/DASH.

skills.name: Media Processing Injection Risk
skills.description: Identifies ImageMagick policy bypass, FFmpeg argument injection via unsanitized filenames.

skills.name: Image/PDF Metadata Exposure
skills.description: EXIF/IPTC GPS coordinates, camera info, author, creation software, internal paths in uploaded media.

skills.name: NATT PPTX Report Generator
skills.description: Generates a 10-slide PowerPoint mission brief from vault data with NATT dark theme, pivot tables, and charts.

skills.name: Subdomain Enumeration
skills.description: Certificate transparency logs (crt.sh), DNS brute via wordlist, NSEC zone walking.

skills.name: DNS Intelligence
skills.description: A, AAAA, MX, TXT, SPF, DKIM, DMARC record analysis — mail spoofing posture determination.

skills.name: Google Dork Generation
skills.description: Generates targeted site:, filetype:, inurl:, intitle: dorks for the target domain.

skills.name: WHOIS Footprint Mapping
skills.description: Registrar, registration date, name server, RDAP data — covers org infrastructure footprint.

skills.name: Certificate Transparency
skills.description: Pulls all issued certs for domain — reveals internal subdomains, wildcard usage, historical infra.

skills.name: BullMQ Cron Scheduler
skills.description: Schedule recurring NATT reports with full cadence control: hourly/daily/weekly/biweekly/monthly/custom. Persisted in .natt/cron/schedules.json.

skills.name: Mission Vault Archive
skills.description: Persistent JSON storage of all missions in .natt/vault/. Queryable by date range, operator, severity, mission type, risk rating.
queryMethods: listVaultMissionsInRange(filter?: { from?, to?, operator?, missionType?, riskRating? })

skillGroups.name: Persistent Memory System
skillGroups.description: Three-tier persistent memory (procedural, semantic, episodic) stored at NATT_MEMORY_PATH (default .natt/memory.json). Enables cross-mission pattern recognition and operator context retention.

skills.name: Procedural Memory
skills.description: Stores learned techniques, successful attack paths, tool preferences. Auto-referenced during new missions for faster recon.

skills.name: Semantic Memory
skills.description: Tech stack fingerprints, known infrastructure patterns, org-specific knowledge. Persisted across sessions.

skills.name: Episodic Memory
skills.description: Timestamped mission logs with findings, operator actions, and outcomes. Used for trend analysis and regression tracking.

skills.name: Background Memory Compaction
skills.description: Periodic compaction of episodic memory to reduce storage and improve retrieval speed. Deduplicates findings, merges related entries.

skillGroups.name: Internal Recon Utilities
skillGroups.description: Core recon functions used internally by mission execution. Not exported — invoked by launchNATTMission() based on mission type and ghost mode.

skills.name: HTTP Probe
skills.description: Fetches target URL with configurable timeout, User-Agent, TLS settings. Foundation for all HTTP-based recon.

skills.name: Security Headers Parser
skills.description: Checks 9 security headers: HSTS, CSP, X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, Referrer-Policy, Permissions-Policy, X-XSS-Protection, COOP, CORP.

skills.name: Cookie Analyzer
skills.description: Parses Set-Cookie headers for Secure, HttpOnly, SameSite flag presence and correctness.

skills.name: HTML Analyzer
skills.description: Extracts forms, JS files, inline scripts, sensitive comments, insecure resource loads, meta tags.

skills.name: Technology Stack Detector
skills.description: 18 fingerprint patterns: WordPress, Drupal, React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, Laravel, Django, Rails, ASP.NET, and more.

skills.name: Subdomain Enumerator
skills.description: DNS-based enumeration with 32 common subdomain prefixes.

skills.name: TLS Info Probe
skills.description: Extracts TLS protocol version, cipher suite, certificate expiry via socket connection.

skills.name: Sensitive Endpoint Discovery
skills.description: Probes 16 common paths (/admin, /api, /config, /debug, /swagger, etc.) for exposed surfaces.

skills.name: Google Dork Generator
skills.description: Produces 12 Google dork query templates for the target domain.

skills.name: Safe Port Scanner
skills.description: Invokes nmap via execFileSync with safe array arguments. ROE-gated.

skillGroups.name: Expansion Skill Modules
skillGroups.description: Expanded NATT skill modules implemented as separate TypeScript files under src/agents/natt-skills-*.ts.

skills.name: Nuclei Template Runner
skills.description: Runs Nuclei vulnerability scanner templates via execFileSync. Parses JSON output and maps to NATTFinding schema. Requires nuclei binary on PATH.

skills.name: Shodan / Censys Integration
skills.description: Queries Shodan and Censys APIs for host intelligence — open ports, services, banners, CVEs, ASN, geolocation. Generates NATTFindings for dangerous ports and known vulnerabilities.

skills.name: LLM Prompt Injection Testing
skills.function: runPromptInjectionScan(target, sendMessage, options?) | testInjection(test, sendMessage) | createCustomInjectionTest(...)
skills.description: 12 built-in prompt injection tests across 6 categories: direct-injection, indirect-injection, data-exfiltration, jailbreak, tool-abuse, encoding-bypass. OWASP LLM01:2023 coverage.

skills.name: Live CVE Correlation
skills.description: Parses package.json, requirements.txt, go.mod, Cargo.toml manifests and queries OSV.dev API for known vulnerabilities. Returns CVEMatch objects with fix versions and CVSS scores.

skills.name: Cloud Misconfiguration Scan
skills.description: Full Cloudflare zone security audit: SSL/TLS mode, minimum TLS version, HTTPS rewrites, security level, WAF status, DNS posture (SPF/DMARC/origin exposure), and firewall rules. Uses CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN env var.

skills.name: Mobile App API Recon
skills.description: Extracts API endpoints, hardcoded secrets, deep links, and config URLs from decompiled mobile app content. Supports APK strings, IPA bundles, React Native, Flutter, smali, and raw binary dumps.

skills.name: RAG-Enhanced Mission Context
skills.function: indexMissionFindings(mission) | searchMissionHistory(query, limit?) | enrichFindingsWithHistory(findings) | indexSingleFinding(missionId, finding)
skills.description: Indexes mission findings into RAG vector store (via RAGEngine + OpenAI embeddings) for semantic retrieval. Enables cross-mission pattern detection, recurring vulnerability tracking, and contextual enrichment.
skills.requires: OPENAI_API_KEY env var + PostgreSQL with pgvector

tools.name: get_roe_template
tools.description: Get ROE template for a mission type (scope, time window, forbidden techniques, evidence requirements)

tools.name: validate_roe_checklist
tools.description: Validate mission parameters against ROE constraints — returns pass/fail per check

tools.name: get_mission_guidance
tools.description: Get phase checklist and hard limits for a specific mission type

tools.name: identify_hash
tools.description: Identify hash type, crackability, hashcat/john modes from hash string

tools.name: get_password_attacks
tools.description: Get password attack techniques and defenses for a context

tools.name: get_auth_bypass_techniques
tools.description: Get auth bypass vector catalog filtered by context (jwt/oauth/session/all)

tools.name: get_secret_patterns
tools.description: Get all secret detection regex signatures with metadata

tools.name: scan_for_secrets
tools.description: Scan submitted content for exposed secrets against pattern library

tools.name: get_default_credentials
tools.description: Look up known default credentials for a given service name
